messages.message: Was trying the Doc Summarisation app to create a video/reel on it for social and i got the results as NA for the summary, this could be because the document is ~400 pages. But is NA the expected response in case the doc is too long?
It doesnâ€™t work well beyond 10 page documents. We have to look into improving it @avi

We need model improvements to make this work better for longer docs by using a map-reduce/agents approach. Currently the converse prompt only takes 10 pages of context.

That being said, I still wouldn't expect it to come back with N/A on a doc longer than 10 pages. It should still summarise 10 pages worth of content right? @Shubham
Here - it summarises a 178 page book. It would still be an incomplete summary since it's not considering the whole book. But it still gives an answer

@Ab to unblock, maybe try a different long doc?

We should separately see why it isn't working for the constitution. Found another long doc (Apollo 17 flight plan) where it is giving N/A. Docs attached. @Shubham @Saumya - any ideas for how we can investigate this?
